item.title: .Site.Title
item.description: Title Internet by itself doesn’t work Need curriculum and feedback Need information at the right time, not shoveled into public school What are existing sources of community knowledge? Why do they exist?

item.title: .Site.Title
item.description: What is the purpose of libraries? To provide reliable information. What does reliable information look like in the internet age?
